name: NITIKA CHAUDHARY
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

full_output.summary: A results-driven software engineer with a strong foundation in data science, programming, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Java, and web technologies with hands-on experience in data analysis and model development. Adept at solving complex problems and delivering insights through data-driven approaches. Looking for software engineering roles to apply theoretical knowledge in practical, real-world projects.

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Spotify Data Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed Spotify music streaming data to identify trends and patterns in user behavior. Utilized technologies such as Python, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Jupyter Notebook. Cleaned and processed data collected from Spotify API and performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) Generated visualizations to provide actionable insights, leading to recommendations for marketing strategies.

projects.name: Loan Approval Prediction
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict loan approval status using Python and Scikit-learn. Preprocessed raw data and applied algorithms including Random Forest and Decision Trees. Achieved 85% accuracy on the final model after performance tuning and validation. Presented the model's predictions and potential business applications.

experiences.description: Assisted in analyzing data trends, deriving meaningful insights from large datasets. Collaborated on various tasks, including dataset preparation, exploratory analysis, and presenting findings.

soft_skills: Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
